title: Vellaiyaai Manam Lyrics Chokka Thangam
stanzas:
Vellaiyaai manam pillaiyaai
gunam kondavan nee allava
thandhai thaai ennai thaangiya
dheivamum nee allava(2)

thoosi puyal veesi
andha sooriyan saivathilla
nooru thadai vandhum
nee eppodhum thotradhilla

Vellaiyaai manam pillaiyaai
gunam kondavan nee allava
thandhai thaai ennai thaangiya
dheivamum nee allava

ennai andri verulagam
unaku illai ena vazhnthavan ne
enaku jeevan jeevan
nee allava.

kannai katti kaattil vitta
kadhai pol kannan
anje nee irundhal
endhan moochum
pechum nindridume

nee endrendrum
ennodu udan pirakka
dhinam naan vaendum
dheivangal varam tharume

Vellaiyaai manam pillaiyaai
gunam kondavan nee allava
thandhai thaai ennai thaangiya
dheivamum nee allava

vaeruvitta aazhamaram
nizhalil saerugira
baakkiyamthaan
kodutha endrum endrum
naan maravaen

nandhavana pookalena
malarndhu naam sirikkum
neram varum
viraindhu thendral vandhu
naam midhappom

ungal oorgola vaiboga
katchi thanai
en kannaara naan kaana
kathirikken

Vellaiyaai manam pillaiyaai
gunam kondavan nee allava
thandhai thaai ennai thaangiya
dheivamum nee allava

thoosi puyal veesi
andha sooriyan saivathilla
nooru thadai vandhum
nee eppodhum thotradhilla

Vellaiyaai manam pillaiyaai
gunam kondavan nee allava
thandhai thaai ennai thaangiya
dheivamum nee allava

seo.title: Vellaiyaai Manam Lyrics Chokka Thangam
seo.description: Get the complete Vellaiyaai Manam Lyrics Chokka Thangam from Chokka Thangam. composed by Deva and sung by Malaysia Vasudevan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
